feedTitle: CSS Tip: Learn CSS the easy way
summary:
Create a nice decorative line with rounded dashes using a few lines of code

Responsive (no cut or partial dash)
You can easily switch to the vertical version
Optimized with CSS variables


Code available here: css-shape. com/rounded-dashes

summary:
Morning
A fairly normal morning in the shop.  I arrived at 8:45am and got things opened up, set bikes out front, and pulled in eBike batteries to recharge.  Organized the rental bikes so that the road and gravel bikes were all on one side and the mountain bikes on the other...
title: An Incomplete Recounting of My Day

summary:
The above piece of art was created by one of today's clients. 
He was about to throw the container from a burned-out tea light when he thought, "I can make something out of that. " He had made several different versions, and when I complimented him on its beauty and cleverness, he replied:

It's nothing special...
title: The Art of Seeing
